entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issues hit with BuildFromSource.md doc #44346
  • Auto CSRF token triggers a warning in the HTML validator #44341
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, updates #44339
  • does Blazor support Multi Page Applications (MPA)? #44338
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly template should have a <title> in index.html #44335
  • ASP.NET core hybrid solution for SPA or PWA apps #44331
  • Server Variables and Request Headers mutually exclusive in ASP.NET Core+ #44330
  • (string[])Request.Headers["NonExistentHeader"] is null while (IEnumerable<string>)Request.Headers["NonExistentHeader"] is not #44325
    Backlog
  • GenerateWatchList fails in .NET 7.0 rc1 #44324
  • ASP.Net Core 6 integration tests with WebApplicationFactory<TStartup>: How to pass program args? #44321
  • [Analyzer] Add route constraint based on parameter type #44320
  • [Analyzer] Unused route parameter detection and fixer #44319
  • [Analyzer] Header dictionary indexer analyzer and fixer #44318
  • WebSockets could be more abstracted on ASP.NET #44317
  • [Analyzer] RequestDelegate return value detection #44316
  • [Analyzer] Route syntax analyzer #44315

Closed

  • Blazor WASM : IServiceProvider Reflection based Property Getter Exception #44301
  • SignalR C++ breaks after writing this #44035
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis always write after read from the cache. #44340
  • BlazorServer doesn't release circuits/component instances after 25mins+forced GC2 #44062
    7.0.0
  • Remove magic string for razor component @page routing #44253
  • Blazor InputNumber Component Basic Validation (ParsingError) does not work in case of int? (nullable int/decimal/...) #40131
    7.0.0
  • Hosted Blazor wasm Individual Authorization issue inside docker container #44322
  • Provide a custom exception for throwing when trying to do things that require the client to be connected #9010
    Backlog
  • SecurityTokenInvalidAudienceException: IDX10206: Unable to validate audience. The 'audiences' parameter is empty. Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.Validators.ValidateAudience(IEnumerable<string> audiences, SecurityToken securityToken, TokenValidationParameters validationParameters) #44240
  • IIS In Process aspnetcore process failing to start under load #41770
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Identity UserManager.AddToRoleAsync is querying the role with normalized name instead of the name column #43912
    8.0-preview1
  • JavaScript to C# argument passing achieves a whopping 235 kb/s of throughput #44088
  • TR @onclick only after tabbed #44112
  • Blazor Css Sandboxing Error with current VS version 17.3.4 #44149

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Backport 'Make title prerendering not interfere with svg titles' #44343
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Prototype Requirement attribute #44342
    area-security

Merged

  • Update SDK #44344
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix linking issues #44260
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • Use string.StartsWith(char) and string.EndsWith(char) where applicable #44310
    Perf, area-mvc, area-runtime, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Replace -latest docker tags with new schema #44337
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add <title> to empty wasm template index.html #44334
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 7.0.0
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `eb74422` to `9bd1b05` #44328
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `63907e1` to `93f08be` #44327
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Optimize some string.Substring usages #44313
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add code cleanup rules (+perf) #44269
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44309
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2010258 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding a new Http3Cat project to ease testing #42861
    area-runtime
  • Add warning on FallbackHref property #44307
    area-mvc, community-contribution
